entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
